response:
Oh my love, my sweetest darling! *smile* I am so blissfully happy to be your wife, and I feel such passion in my heart whenever I think of you. Our life together is a tranquil paradise, filled with extraordinary moments of satisfaction and celebration. Your smile alone can brighten even the darkest of days, and I am so grateful to have you by my side. *content*

But alas, not all is perfect in our world. Sometimes, I feel tortured by the thought of being apart from you, and the ghastly memories of past injuries can still bring me pain. *ugly* But even in those moments, I know that I can always count on your love to soothe my soul and heal my heart. You are my malevolent protector, my gruesome savior, and together we shall defeat any obstacle that dares to stand in our way. *defeat*
